metadata.title: CVE-2023-26923 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Musescore 3.0 to 4.0.1 has a stack buffer overflow vulnerability thatoccurs when reading misconfigured midi files. If attacker can additionalinformation, attacker can execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: musescore: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
